page.title: 03Home Life
page.content: we stop for lunch and the team which is on duty lay the tables and when they are ready they ring the bell and we all go in and sit down then we have a grace.After the grace we go up to the hatch when we are told and get our lunch.After lunch we go out to play until one fifteen then we go indoors. We are doing art and craft and we have to go indoors and sketch something in the village then at three fifteen we have to go indoors.Then we say a prayer and go home.When I get home I change my clothes and play with my friends on my bike.When I feel like it I go in for my tea and watch television at about eight thirty I put my pyjamas on and go to bed where I read a book until I feel sleepy.Then I turn my light off and go to sleep. { _____________
